long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension was developed to enable our customers efficient usage in our CRM system. Our clients are real estate brokers and the extension allows them to transfer to anyone who is interested in purchasing an apartment, and contacted them, all the relevant assets of the office with just one click, with the extension, directly to the WhatsApp of the person who was interested in the apartment.
